original_title: เมื่อฝนหยดลงบนหัว
overview: Anthology of unconventional high-school love stories that include: a disabled girl falling for the hottest boy in school, a boy who is about to meet his father for the first time becoming embroiled in a relationship with his best friend, and another boy who is considering entering the gay sex trade in order to repay his gambling debts.
title: The Rain Stories
